```{r}
pacman::p_load(sf, tmap, tidyverse)

```

```{r}
sgpools <- read_csv("Data/aspatial/SGPools_svy21.csv")

```

```{r}
sgpools_sf <- st_as_sf(sgpools,
                       coords = c("XCOORD", "YCOORD"),
                       crs = 3414)
```


```{r}
tmap_mode("view")

tm_shape(sgpools_sf) + 
tm_bubbles(col = "red",
           size = 1,
           border.col = "black",
           border.lwd = 1)

tmap_mode("plot")
```
